name: Aetherstorm Roc
text:
Flying
Whenever Aetherstorm Roc or another creature enters the battlefield under your control, you get {E} (an energy counter).
Whenever Aetherstorm Roc attacks, you may pay {E}{E}. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on it and tap up to one target creature defending player controls.

name: Aetherstream Leopard
text:
Trample
When Aetherstream Leopard enters the battlefield, you get {E} (an energy counter).
Whenever Aetherstream Leopard attacks, you may pay {E}. If you do, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

name: Aether Swooper
text:
Flying
When Aether Swooper enters the battlefield, you get {E}{E} (two energy counters).
Whenever Aether Swooper attacks, you may pay {E}{E}. If you do, create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token.

name: Aether Theorist
text:
When Aether Theorist enters the battlefield, you get {E}{E}{E} (three energy counters).
{T}, Pay {E}: Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

name: Aether Tide
text:
As an additional cost to cast Aether Tide, discard X creature cards.
Return X target creatures to their owners' hands.

editions.flavor: The tide of magic brought them here. Now it would take them home.

name: Æther Tide
text:
As an additional cost to cast Æther Tide, discard X creature cards.
Return X target creatures to their owners' hands.

editions.flavor: The tide of magic brought them here. Now it would take them home.

name: Aethertide Whale
text:
Flying
When Aethertide Whale enters the battlefield, you get {E}{E}{E}{E}{E}{E} (six energy counters).
Pay {E}{E}{E}{E}: Return Aethertide Whale to its owner's hand.

editions.flavor:
"To survive up here, I've learned when to use my harpoon and when to just enjoy the view."
—Kadhu, skywhaler

name: Aethertorch Renegade
text:
When Aethertorch Renegade enters the battlefield, you get {E}{E}{E}{E} (four energy counters).
{T}, Pay {E}{E}: Aethertorch Renegade deals 1 damage to target creature.
{T}, Pay {E}{E}{E}{E}{E}{E}{E}{E}: Aethertorch Renegade deals 6 damage to target player.

name: Aethertow
text:
Put target attacking or blocking creature on top of its owner's library.
Conspire (As you cast this spell, you may tap two untapped creatures you control that share a color with it. When you do, copy it and you may choose a new target for the copy.)

name: Æthertow
text:
Put target attacking or blocking creature on top of its owner's library.
Conspire (As you cast this spell, you may tap two untapped creatures you control that share a color with it. When you do, copy it and you may choose a new target for the copy.)

name: Aether Tradewinds
text: Return target permanent you control and target permanent you don't control to their owners' hands.

editions.flavor:
"The wind smells of misfortune. Check your knots."
—Anitan, Ondu cleric
Consulate engineers have developed safe methods of harvesting aether, but renegades aren't always so careful.

"The wind smells of misfortune. Check your knots."

text: Return target permanent you control and target permanent you don't control to their owners' hands.

name: Aether Vial
text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a charge counter on Aether Vial.
{T}: You may put a creature card with converted mana cost equal to the number of charge counters on Aether Vial from your hand onto the battlefield.

name: Æther Vial
text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a charge counter on Æther Vial.
{T}: You may put a creature card with converted mana cost equal to the number of charge counters on Æther Vial from your hand onto the battlefield.

name: Aether Web
text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1, has reach, and can block creatures with shadow as though they didn't have shadow. (Creatures with reach can block creatures with flying.)

name: Æther Web
text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1, has reach, and can block creatures with shadow as though they didn't have shadow. (Creatures with reach can block creatures with flying.)

name: Aetherwind Basker
text:
Trample
Whenever Aetherwind Basker enters the battlefield or attacks, you get {E} (an energy counter) for each creature you control.
Pay {E}: Aetherwind Basker gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

editions.flavor: Its frill inspired the design of efficient aether collectors.

name: Aetherworks Marvel
text:
Whenever a permanent you control is put into a graveyard, you get {E} (an energy counter).
{T}, Pay {E}{E}{E}{E}{E}{E}: Look at the top six cards of your library. You may cast a card from among them without paying its mana cost. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

name: Affa Guard Hound
text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
When Affa Guard Hound enters the battlefield, target creature gets +0/+3 until end of turn.

editions.flavor: Once a welcoming hub for explorers, Affa became a place of guarded tongues and quick defenses.
Once a welcoming hub for explorers, Affa became a place of guarded tongues and quick defenses.
Once a welcoming hub for explorers, Affa became a place of guarded tongues and quick defenses.

name: Affa Protector
text: Vigilance

editions.flavor: "Through all the terrors we face, I hold on to the memory of the world before the Eldrazi came. I'd like to see that world again."

name: Afflict
text:
Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
Draw a card.

editions.flavor: One rarely notices a heartbeat, save when it is stolen.
When one of the Patriarch's champions displeased him, he would only shake his finger. That was enough.

name: Afflicted Deserter
text: At the beginning of each upkeep, if no spells were cast last turn, transform Afflicted Deserter.

editions.flavor: The rising of the first full moon eliminated any doubt as to the horrible truth lurking within.

name: Afiya Grove
text:
Afiya Grove enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it.
At the beginning of your upkeep, move a +1/+1 counter from Afiya Grove onto target creature.
When Afiya Grove has no +1/+1 counters on it, sacrifice it.

name: Afterlife
text: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated. Its controller creates a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

editions.flavor: Facets of life, reflections of the soul.

name: Aftershock
text: Destroy target artifact, creature, or land. Aftershock deals 3 damage to you.

editions.flavor:
"Every act of destruction has a repercussion."
—Karn, silver golem

"Every act of destruction has a repercussion."
—Karn, silver golem

"Every act of destruction has a repercussion."
—Karn, silver golem

name: Agadeem Occultist
text: {T}: Put target creature card from an opponent's graveyard onto the battlefield under your control if its converted mana cost is less than or equal to the number of Allies you control.

name: Ageless Entity
text: Whenever you gain life, put that many +1/+1 counters on Ageless Entity.

editions.flavor: Tel-Jilad's sworn protectors are the trolls, yet more fearsome protectors were created by the Tangle itself.

editions.set: Duel Decks: Ajani vs. Nicol Bolas
editions.flavor: Tel-Jilad's sworn protectors are the trolls, yet more fearsome protectors were created by the Tangle itself.

name: Ageless Sentinels
text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
Flying
When Ageless Sentinels blocks, it becomes a Bird Giant, and it loses defender. (It's no longer a Wall. This effect lasts indefinitely.)

name: Agent of Acquisitions
text:
Draft Agent of Acquisitions face up.
Instead of drafting a card from a booster pack, you may draft each card in that booster pack, one at a time. If you do, turn Agent of Acquisitions face down and you can't draft cards for the rest of this draft round. (You may look at booster packs passed to you.)

name: Agent of Erebos
text: Constellation — Whenever Agent of Erebos or another enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, exile all cards from target player's graveyard.

editions.flavor: Erebos's minions hunt the Returned and warn those who consider the same folly.

name: Agent of Horizons
text: {2}{U}: Agent of Horizons can't be blocked this turn.

editions.flavor: The light in the woods just before dawn reveals a glimmering network of branches, roots, and spiderwebs. The acolytes of Kruphix walk this lattice unseen.

name: Agent of Masks
text: At the beginning of your upkeep, each opponent loses 1 life. You gain life equal to the life lost this way.

editions.flavor: "Two-faced" is an understatement.
"You say that I am two-faced? Enough with the flattery. We have business to conduct."

name: Agent of Shauku
text: {1}{B}, Sacrifice a land: Target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

editions.flavor: "Go ahead. Take it. You'll be so very powerful . . . and what harm can it do?"

name: Agent of Stromgald
text: {R}: Add {B} to your mana pool.

editions.flavor:
"The Order of Stromgald spreads its poisonous lies from within Varchild's troops, and still she sees only visions of conquest."
—Lovisa Coldeyes, Balduvian Chieftain

"The ‘fabled' Order of Stromgald is cast to the four winds, lost for all time. I, for one, give them no thought."
—General Varchild

name: Agent of the Fates
text:
Deathtouch
Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Agent of the Fates, each opponent sacrifices a creature.

editions.flavor: "You are breathing borrowed air."

name: Aggravate
text: Aggravate deals 1 damage to each creature target player controls. Each creature dealt damage this way attacks this turn if able.

editions.flavor:
"Barbarians! They burned my favorite chair! We'll kill them all!"
—Anje Falkenrath

name: Aggravated Assault
text: {3}{R}{R}: Untap all creatures you control. After this main phase, there is an additional combat phase followed by an additional main phase. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

name: Aggression
text:
Enchant non-Wall creature
Enchanted creature has first strike and trample.
At the beginning of the end step of enchanted creature's controller, destroy that creature if it didn't attack this turn.

editions.flavor: The star that burns twice as bright burns half as long.

name: Aggressive Mining
text:
You can't play lands.
Sacrifice a land: Draw two cards. Activate this ability only once each turn.

editions.flavor: Designed by Markus Persson

name: Aggressive Urge
text:
Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
Draw a card.

editions.flavor: The power of the wild, concentrated in a single charge.
The power of the wild, concentrated in a single charge.

name: Agility
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has flanking. (Whenever a creature without flanking blocks this creature, the blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.)

name: Agonizing Demise
text:
Kicker {1}{R} (You may pay an additional {1}{R} as you cast this spell.)
Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated. If Agonizing Demise was kicked, it deals damage equal to that creature's power to the creature's controller.

editions.set: Duel Decks: Ajani vs. Nicol Bolas

name: Agonizing Memories
text: Look at target player's hand and choose two cards from it. Put them on top of that player's library in any order.

editions.flavor:
"An innocent man died because of my anger. That knowledge will haunt me for all eternity."
—Karn, silver golem

"I think little of the foes I've slain. But I'm haunted by the friends I've sent to die."
—The Southern Paladin

"An innocent man died because of my anger. That knowledge will haunt me for all eternity."
—Karn, silver golem
In the aftermath of war, when the slaying is long done, the greatest miseries come home to roost.

name: Agony Warp
text:
Target creature gets -3/-0 until end of turn.
Target creature gets -0/-3 until end of turn.

editions.flavor: Life's circle has become inverted in Grixis. The same energy is endlessly recycled and becomes more stagnant with each pass.
Life's circle has become inverted in Grixis. The same energy is endlessly recycled and becomes more stagnant with each pass.

name: Agoraphobia
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets -5/-0.
{2}{U}: Return Agoraphobia to its owner's hand.

editions.flavor: "Everyone in this city is choosing sides. I choose inside."
"Everyone in this city is choosing sides. I choose inside."

name: Agrus Kos, Wojek Veteran
text: Whenever Agrus Kos, Wojek Veteran attacks, attacking red creatures get +2/+0 and attacking white creatures get +0/+2 until end of turn.

editions.flavor: Lieutenant Kos has never met a group of recruits he could not inspire or a mob he could not quell.

name: Agyrem
text:
Whenever a white creature dies, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.
Whenever a nonwhite creature dies, return it to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.
Whenever you roll {CHAOS}, creatures can't attack you until a player planeswalks.

name: Ahn-Crop Champion
text: You may exert Ahn-Crop Champion as it attacks. When you do, untap all other creatures you control. (An exerted creature won't untap during your next untap step.)

editions.flavor: "The Second Sun nears its destination! Let it light the way to ours!"

name: Ahn-Crop Crasher
text:
Haste
You may exert Ahn-Crop Crasher as it attacks. When you do, target creature can't block this turn. (An exerted creature won't untap during your next untap step.)

editions.flavor:
"Hesitation breeds dissension. To be worthy of the next life, you must never look back."
—Anep, vizier of Hazoret

name: Aid from the Cowl
text: Revolt — At the beginning of your end step, if a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn, reveal the top card of your library. If it's a permanent card, you may put it onto the battlefield. Otherwise, you may put it on the bottom of your library.

name: Aim High
text: Untap target creature. It gets +2/+2 and gains reach until end of turn. (It can block creatures with flying.)

editions.flavor:
"A slayer gets by on wits and reflexes."
—Higa, slayer-captain of Gatstaf

name: Ainok Artillerist
text: Ainok Artillerist has reach as long as it has a +1/+1 counter on it. (It can block creatures with flying.)

editions.flavor:
"In the Tarkir I once knew, the Abzan revered their ancestor trees. Now, as Dromoka, they cut their finest groves to make weapons."
—Sarkhan Vol

name: Ainok Bond-Kin
text:
Outlast {1}{W} ({1}{W}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. Outlast only as a sorcery.)
Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has first strike.

editions.flavor: "Hold the line, for family and the fallen!"

name: Ainok Guide
text:
When Ainok Guide enters the battlefield, choose one —
• Put a +1/+1 counter on Ainok Guide.
• Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, then shuffle your library and put that card on top of it.

name: Ainok Survivalist
text:
Megamorph {1}{G} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its megamorph cost and put a +1/+1 counter on it.)
When Ainok Survivalist is turned face up, destroy target artifact or enchantment an opponent controls.

name: Ainok Tracker
text:
First strike
Morph {4}{R} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

editions.flavor:
"The ainok are wild dogs, not fit to join us around the fire."
—Surrak, the Hunt Caller
Some ainok of the mountains are accepted among the Temur as trusted hunt-mates.

name: Air Bladder
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has flying.
Enchanted creature can block only creatures with flying.

editions.flavor: Random mutations among Rootwater merfolk were common—and disturbing.

name: Airborne Aid
text: Draw a card for each Bird on the battlefield.

editions.flavor:
"We help our Southern Order comrades as much as we can. But the Cabal's insidious influence spreads, dividing our forces and leaving new arrivals to fend for themselves."
—Commander Eesha

name: Airdrop Aeronauts
text:
Flying
Revolt — When Airdrop Aeronauts enters the battlefield, if a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn, you gain 5 life.

editions.flavor: "Supplies inbound. Keep that pressure on."

name: Airdrop Condor
text:
Flying
{1}{R}, Sacrifice a Goblin creature: Airdrop Condor deals damage equal to the sacrificed creature's power to target creature or player.

editions.flavor: It has two kinds of droppings, neither of which is particularly pleasant.

name: Air Elemental
text: Flying

editions.flavor: As insubstantial, and as powerful, as the wind that carries it.
Pray that it doesn't seek the safety of your lungs.

"The East Wind, an interloper in the dominions of Westerly Weather, is an impassive-faced tyrant with a sharp poniard held behind his back for a treacherous stab."
—Joseph Conrad, The Mirror of the Sea
As insubstantial, and as powerful, as the wind that carries it.
These spirits of the air are winsome and wild and cannot be truly contained. Only marginally intelligent, they often substitute whimsy for strategy, delighting in mischief and mayhem.

name: Aisling Leprechaun
text: Whenever Aisling Leprechaun blocks or becomes blocked by a creature, that creature becomes green. (This effect lasts indefinitely.)

name: Ajani, Caller of the Pride
text:
+1: Put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature.
−3: Target creature gains flying and double strike until end of turn.
−8: Create X 2/2 white Cat creature tokens, where X is your life total.

name: Ajani Goldmane
text:
+1: You gain 2 life.
−1: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control. Those creatures gain vigilance until end of turn.
−6: Create a white Avatar creature token. It has "This creature's power and toughness are each equal to your life total."

name: Ajani, Mentor of Heroes
text:
+1: Distribute three +1/+1 counters among one, two, or three target creatures you control.
+1: Look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal an Aura, creature, or planeswalker card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
−8: You gain 100 life.

name: Ajani's Aid
text:
When Ajani's Aid enters the battlefield, you may search your library and/or graveyard for a card named Ajani, Valiant Protector, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you search your library this way, shuffle it.
Sacrifice Ajani's Aid: Prevent all combat damage a creature of your choice would deal this turn.

name: Ajani's Chosen
text: Whenever an enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, create a 2/2 white Cat creature token. If that enchantment is an Aura, you may attach it to the token.

editions.flavor: "United, our roar will level mountains."
"United, our roar will level mountains."

name: Ajani's Comrade
text:
Trample
At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you control an Ajani planeswalker, put a +1/+1 counter on Ajani's Comrade.

editions.flavor: "I will go where the lion-man leads."

name: Ajani's Mantra
text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may gain 1 life.

editions.set: Duel Decks: Ajani vs. Nicol Bolas
editions.flavor:
"He hasn't returned to the Cloud Forest. But I can still sense his calming presence."
—Zaliki of Naya

"He hasn't returned to the Cloud Forest. But I can still sense his calming presence."
—Zaliki of Naya

name: Ajani's Presence
text:
Strive — Ajani's Presence costs {2}{W} more to cast for each target beyond the first.
Any number of target creatures each get +1/+1 and gain indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy them.)

name: Ajani's Pridemate
text: Whenever you gain life, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Ajani's Pridemate.

editions.set: Duel Decks: Ajani vs. Nicol Bolas
editions.flavor:
"When one of us prospers, the pride prospers."
—Jazal Goldmane

—Jazal Goldmane

"When one of us prospers, the pride prospers."
—Jazal Goldmane

name: Ajani's Sunstriker
text: Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)

editions.flavor: "Ajani goes where he is needed most and in his name we keep his lands safe."
"Ajani goes where he is needed most and in his name we keep his lands safe."

name: Ajani Steadfast
text:
+1: Until end of turn, up to one target creature gets +1/+1 and gains first strike, vigilance, and lifelink.
−2: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control and a loyalty counter on each other planeswalker you control.
−7: You get an emblem with "If a source would deal damage to you or a planeswalker you control, prevent all but 1 of that damage."

name: Ajani Unyielding
text:
+2: Reveal the top three cards of your library. Put all nonland permanent cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
−2: Exile target creature. Its controller gains life equal to its power.
−9: Put five +1/+1 counters on each creature you control and five loyalty counters on each other planeswalker you control.

name: Ajani, Valiant Protector
text:
+2: Put two +1/+1 counters on up to one target creature.
+1: Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a creature card. Put that card into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
−11: Put X +1/+1 counters on target creature, where X is your life total. That creature gains trample until end of turn.

name: Ajani Vengeant
text:
+1: Target permanent doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
−2: Ajani Vengeant deals 3 damage to target creature or player and you gain 3 life.
−7: Destroy all lands target player controls.

editions.set: Duel Decks: Ajani vs. Nicol Bolas

name: Akiri, Line-Slinger
text:
First strike, vigilance
Akiri, Line-Slinger gets +1/+0 for each artifact you control.
Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)

editions.flavor: Her bold movements are anchored in the careful precision of each rope.

name: Akki Avalanchers
text: Sacrifice a land: Akki Avalanchers gets +2/+0 until end of turn. Activate this ability only once each turn.

editions.flavor: Among Godo's hordes, "beware of falling rocks" came to mean "akki live nearby."

name: Akki Blizzard-Herder
text: When Akki Blizzard-Herder dies, each player sacrifices a land.

editions.flavor:
"It remains unclear whether the akki shamans could in fact create storms or simply predicted them."
—The History of Kamigawa

name: Akki Coalflinger
text:
First strike
{R}, {T}: Attacking creatures gain first strike until end of turn.

editions.set: Duel Decks Anthology, Elves vs. Goblins
editions.flavor: No matter where you find them, goblins love rocks.
No matter where you find them, goblins love rocks.
No matter where you find them, goblins love rocks.

name: Akki Drillmaster
text: {T}: Target creature gains haste until end of turn.

editions.flavor: "What part of ‘hayaku ikee!' did you not understand?"

name: Akki Lavarunner
text:
Haste
Whenever Akki Lavarunner deals damage to an opponent, flip it.

name: Akki Raider
text: Whenever a land is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, Akki Raider gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

editions.flavor: Akki were very territorial, attacking and destroying any settlements that came too close to their mountain homes. The more successful their raids, the bolder they became.

name: Akki Rockspeaker
text: When Akki Rockspeaker enters the battlefield, add {R} to your mana pool.

editions.flavor: The lava-proof shells of akki evolved over centuries, as akki pranks almost always got seriously out of hand.

name: Akki Underling
text: As long as you have seven or more cards in hand, Akki Underling gets +2/+1 and has first strike.

editions.flavor:
"I lost my hounds in the war and thus found myself employing akki as servants. I found their training to be remarkably similar."
—Kensuke, houndmaster

name: Akki Underminer
text: Whenever Akki Underminer deals combat damage to a player, that player sacrifices a permanent.

editions.flavor:
"Deep inside the Sokenzan Mountains, a band of akki discovered a cache of ancient items of power. Their ensuing spree of destruction became known as ‘The Three Days of Fun.'"
—Observations of the Kami War

name: Akoum
text:
Players may cast enchantment spells as though they had flash.
Whenever you roll CHAOS, destroy target creature that isn't enchanted.

name: Akoum Battlesinger
text:
Haste
Whenever Akoum Battlesinger or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, you may have Ally creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.

name: Akoum Boulderfoot
text: When Akoum Boulderfoot enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

editions.flavor:
"If you're in Akoum and you glimpse a shadow overhead, the worst thing you can do is duck."
—Chadir the Navigator

name: Akoum Firebird
text:
Flying, haste
Akoum Firebird attacks each turn if able.
Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may pay {4}{R}{R}. If you do, return Akoum Firebird from your graveyard to the battlefield.

name: Akoum Flameseeker
text: Cohort — {T}, Tap an untapped Ally you control: Discard a card. If you do, draw a card.

editions.flavor: In the face of extinction, the most perilous endeavors can be cause for hope.

name: Akoum Hellkite
text:
Flying
Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Akoum Hellkite deals 1 damage to target creature or player. If that land is a Mountain, Akoum Hellkite deals 2 damage to that creature or player instead.

name: Akoum Refuge
text:
Akoum Refuge enters the battlefield tapped.
When Akoum Refuge enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.
{T}: Add {B} or {R} to your mana pool.

name: Akoum Stonewaker
text: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may pay {2}{R}. If you do, create a 3/1 red Elemental creature token with trample and haste. Exile that token at the beginning of the next end step.

name: Akrasan Squire
text: Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)

editions.flavor: Bant's armies are primarily composed of members of the Mortar caste, loyal commoners who haven't yet earned a sigil.

name: Akroan Conscriptor
text: Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Akroan Conscriptor, gain control of another target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn.

editions.flavor: "The time to serve is now."

name: Akroan Crusader
text: Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Akroan Crusader, create a 1/1 red Soldier creature token with haste.

editions.flavor: An Akroan soldier's worth is measured by the number of swords raised by his battle cry.

name: Akroan Hoplite
text: Whenever Akroan Hoplite attacks, it gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the number of attacking creatures you control.

editions.flavor: "Fair fight? How could it be a fair fight? We're Akroans. They're not."
"Fair fight? How could it be a fair fight? We're Akroans. They're not."

name: Akroan Horse
text:
Defender
When Akroan Horse enters the battlefield, an opponent gains control of it.
At the beginning of your upkeep, each opponent creates a 1/1 white Soldier creature token.
